title: Phase 3 Validation Configuration
description: Defines mandatory selections and validation requirements for Phase 3 software selection
explanation: This configuration controls which categories in Phase 3 are required vs optional, enabling flexible business rule management

tools.rationale: Not all incidents involve identifiable tools

groups.description: At least one group or meta-group must be selected for attribution analysis
groups.rationale: Attribution analysis is essential for threat intelligence and defensive planning

validation_messages.groups_required: Please select at least one threat actor group or attribution category (APT, Cybercrime, Unknown) to continue. Attribution analysis is required for comprehensive incident assessment.
validation_messages.tools_optional: Tools selection is optional. You may proceed without selecting tools.
validation_messages.malware_optional: Malware selection is optional. You may proceed without selecting malware.
validation_messages.general_error: Please complete the required selections to continue.
